item.title: 埃利奥特敦促英国石油公司新任主席解决经营业绩不佳问题
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）最大的股东之一埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）周一呼吁该能源巨头的新任董事长阿尔伯特-曼尼福特（Albert Manifold）"紧急解决英国石油公司的不足之处"。【原文：Elliott Investment Management, one of BP's largest shareholders, on Monday called on the energy giant's new chairman Albert Manifold to "urgently address BP's shortcomings".】

item.title: 赛百味任命汉堡王前高管为首席执行官
item.description: 美国三明治连锁店赛百味（Subway）周一任命汉堡王（Burger King）前高管乔纳森-菲茨帕特里克（Jonathan Fitzpatrick）从 7 月 28 日起担任公司首席执行官。【原文：U.S. sandwich chain Subway on Monday named former Burger King executive Jonathan Fitzpatrick as its CEO starting July 28, tapping a fast-food industry veteran to lift sales and help expand its business globally.】

item.title: 英国国家安全委员会在微软黑客活动中发现 "数量有限 "的英国受害者
item.description: 英国国家网络安全中心（NCSC）周一表示，在一场正在进行的黑客攻击活动中，该中心已检测到 "数量有限 "的英国受害者，他们的服务器受到了微软 SharePoint 系统的影响。【原文：Britain's National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC) said on Monday it had detected a "limited number" of UK-based victims in an ongoing hacking campaign that has affected servers using Microsoft's SharePoint system.】

item.title: 巴黎检察官表示，他们要求马斯克的 X 提供算法信息，而非私人数据。
item.description: 巴黎检察官办公室周一表示，巴黎检察官要求社交媒体平台 X 提供有关其算法的信息，作为调查有组织团伙可能篡改自动数据处理系统和欺诈性数据提取的一部分，而不是为了获取私人数据。【原文：Paris prosecutors requested information from social media platform X about its algorithm as part of a probe into organised gangs' possible tampering with an automated data processing system and fraudulent data extraction, not for access to private data, the office said on Monday.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利从瑞银聘请 Shahsingh 担任北美工业银行业务主管
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，摩根士丹利从瑞银聘请了 Aftab Shahsingh，负责其北美投资银行的工业服务业务。【原文：Morgan Stanley hired Aftab Shahsingh from UBS to lead industrials services coverage in its investment bank in North America, according to a source familiar with the situation.】

item.title: GE Vernova 将收购法国 Alteia 公司，为公用事业提供更多人工智能工具
item.description: 电力设备制造商通用电气弗诺瓦公司（GE Vernova）周一表示，将收购总部位于法国的 Alteia 公司，后者生产基于人工智能的工具，允许公用事业公司对其电网进行审查。【原文：Power equipment maker GE Vernova will buy France-based Alteia, which makes artificial intelligence-based tools that allow utility companies to review their grids, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 墨西哥认为美国没有理由对航空公司实施制裁
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）周一表示，美国尚未正式通知墨西哥政府对墨西哥航空业可能采取的措施，并指出她认为邻国没有理由发起此类制裁。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said on Monday the United States has not yet formally notified her government of possible measures against Mexico's airline sector pointing that she sees no reason for the neighboring country to initiate such sanctions.】

item.title: 美联储在网站的大楼翻新信息页面上添加了视频导览片段
item.description: 在白宫批评美联储翻新华盛顿总部园区两座历史性建筑的项目超支之际，美联储周一增加了一段视频导览片段。【原文：The Federal Reserve on Monday added footage of a video tour of the two historic buildings it is renovating at its Washington headquarters campus amid criticism from the White House over cost overruns for the project.】

item.title: 欧洲通信卫星组织与英国政府签署低地轨道网络接入战略合作协议
item.description: 欧洲通信卫星组织周一表示，它已与英国政府签署了一项战略协议，将通过其低地轨道网络为外交使团、执法活动、军事行动和重大干预行动提供连接服务。【原文：Eutelsat said on Monday it has signed a strategic agreement with the UK government to offer connectivity services through its LEO network for diplomatic missions, law enforcement activities and military operations and critical interventions.】

item.title: 加拿大央行调查：企业对最坏关税情况的担忧减少
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee 和 David Ljunggren【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司因 IT 故障导致地面停飞，取消了周一 7% 的航班
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空公司（Alaska Airlines）表示，由于数据中心的一个关键硬件意外发生故障，导致周日晚些时候停飞，该公司已取消了周一 7% 的航班。【原文：Alaska Airlines said it has canceled 7% of its flights Monday in the aftermath of a ground stop late Sunday prompted by the unexpected failure of a critical piece of hardware at its data centers.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席表示将为退休计划中的私人投资设立警戒线
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）负责人周一在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，如果投资者能更多地进入退休计划中的私人市场，该机构准备与劳工部合作，为投资者设立警戒线。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission is prepared to work with the Labor Department to establish guardrails for investors if they gain greater access to private markets in retirement plans, the agency's chief said in a CNBC interview on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道：Meta、X 和 LinkedIn 对意大利前所未有的增值税索赔提出上诉
item.description: 周一，四位直接了解此事的消息人士称，美国科技巨头 Meta、X 和 LinkedIn 已对意大利提出的一项史无前例的增值税索赔提起上诉。【原文：U.S. tech giants Meta , X and LinkedIn have lodged an appeal against an unprecedented VAT claim by Italy that could influence tax policy across the 27-nation European Union, four sources with direct knowledge of the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 研究人员称，微软服务器遭黑客攻击可能是单一行为者所为，目前已有数千家公司受到攻击
item.description: 一位网络安全研究人员周一表示，数千家政府机构和企业在组织内部共享文件时使用的微软服务器软件遭到全球性攻击，这很可能是一个人所为。【原文：A global attack on Microsoft server software used by thousands of government agencies and businesses to share documents within organisations is likely the work of a single actor, a cybersecurity researcher said on Monday.】

item.title: 加密货币公司 BitGo 秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 数字资产信任与安全服务提供商BitGo周一表示，该公司已秘密申请在美国上市，加密货币公司正竞相利用新的市场动能。【原文：BitGo, a provider of trust and security services for digital assets, said on Monday it has confidentially filed for a U.S. listing, as crypto firms race to capitalize on renewed market momentum.】

item.title: 慧科联合创始人因投票权变更反对美国上市提案
item.description: 汇款公司 Wise 的创始人之一敦促股东们否决将公司迁往美国的计划，因为该计划还包括股东结构的变更，而他认为这些变更被隐藏在提案中。【原文：One of the founders of money transfer company Wise has urged shareholders to reject plans to move the company to the U.S. because the plans also include changes to the shareholder structure which he said were buried in the proposal.】

item.title: 尽管美国加征关税，但巴西经济仍步入正轨，但通胀风险上升
item.description: 路透社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，尽管美国征收关税，巴西的经济增长仍将保持正轨，但如果贸易谈判陷入困境，通胀恶化的风险似乎更大。【原文：Brazil's economic growth will stay on track despite the imposition of U.S. tariffs, according to a Reuters poll of economists, but inflation appears at greater risk of worsening if trade negotiations flounder.】

item.title: 加拿大 Couche-Tard 公司放弃 Seven & I 收购要约后恢复股票回购
item.description: 加拿大 Alimentation Couche-Tard 公司周一表示，在 Circle K 母公司放弃斥资 460 亿美元收购日本 Seven & I 公司的计划几天后，该公司将恢复股票回购计划。【原文：Canada's Alimentation Couche-Tard on Monday said it was resuming its share repurchase program days after the Circle K-parent scrapped its $46-billion attempt to buy Japan's Seven & I .】

item.title: S.韩国时装零售商 F&F 聘请高盛收购泰勒梅
item.description: 韩国时装零售商 F&F Co 周一表示，它已聘请高盛为收购 TaylorMade 提供建议，如果这家全球高尔夫产品制造商的所有者继续进行单独的出售程序，它将采取法律行动。【原文：South Korean fashion retailer F&F Co said on Monday it has hired Goldman Sachs to advise on an acquisition of TaylorMade, and that it would take legal action if the owner of the global golf products maker proceeds with a separate sale process.】

item.title: 贝森特：美国不会在 8 月最后期限前匆忙达成贸易协议，将与中国谈判
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周一表示，在8月1日达成贸易协议或面临高额关税的最后期限到来之前，特朗普政府更关注贸易协议的质量而非时机。【原文：The Trump administration is more concerned with the quality of trade agreements rather than their timing, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Monday ahead of an Aug. 1 deadline for securing a trade deal or facing steep tariffs.】

item.title: 美国财政部贝森特说美联储需要作为一个机构接受审查
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周一表示，需要将整个美联储作为一个机构进行审查，看它是否取得了成功。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Monday said the entire Federal Reserve needed to be examined as an institution and whether it had been successful.】

item.title: 巴西承认 8 月 1 日前可能无法与美国达成贸易协议
item.description: 巴西财政部长周一表示，巴西不会放弃与美国的谈判，但承认可能无法在8月1日前达成协议，届时唐纳德-特朗普总统对巴西商品征收50%关税的规定将生效。【原文：Brazil's finance minister said on Monday that his country will not give up negotiating with the United States, but acknowledged that a deal may not be reached by August 1, when President Donald Trump's 50% tariffs on Brazilian goods are due to take effect.】

item.title: 罗珀科技公司因软件需求强劲而上调年度预期
item.description: 罗珀科技公司（Roper Technologies）周一上调了对全年收入和调整后利润的预期，在宏观经济不确定的情况下，寄希望于其庞大的软件产品组合能够恢复企业支出。【原文：Roper Technologies raised its forecasts for annual revenue and adjusted profit on Monday, betting on resilient enterprise spending on its vast portfolio of software products amid macroeconomic uncertainty.】

item.title: 制药公司百健将在北卡罗来纳州再投资 20 亿美元
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发出关税威胁之际，美国制药商百健（Biogen）周一表示，将对其在北卡罗来纳州的现有生产设施追加投资 20 亿美元，以扩大其在美国的业务。【原文：Biogen will invest an additional $2 billion in its existing manufacturing in North Carolina, the drugmaker said on Monday, as it seeks to expand its presence in the U.S. amid President Donald Trump's tariff threats.】

item.title: 花旗集团称，外国投资者 5 月份购买了近 1000 亿欧元的欧元区债券
item.description: 花旗银行（Citi）援引欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）的数据称，5 月份欧元区债券从集团外部获得了近 1,000 亿欧元（合 1,164 亿美元）的买盘，这是欧元资产受益于从美国市场转移的最新迹象。【原文：Euro zone bonds saw nearly 100 billion euros ($116.4 billion) of buying from outside the bloc in May, Citi said citing European Central Bank data, the latest sign that euro assets are benefitting from a shift away from U.S. markets.】

item.title: 摩洛哥央行探索数字货币跨境支付
item.description: 摩洛哥央行行长阿卜杜拉蒂夫-朱阿里（Abdellatif Jouahri）周一表示，摩洛哥央行正在探索使用自己的数字货币进行点对点和跨境支付。【原文：Morocco's central bank was exploring the use of its own digital currency for peer-to-peer and cross border payments, bank governor Abdellatif Jouahri said on Monday.】

item.title: Verizon因高端计划需求而上调年度利润预期
item.description: Verizon 周一上调了其年度利润预期的下限，原因是对其高级计划的强劲需求推动了第二季度盈利好于预期。【原文：Verizon raised the lower end of its annual profit forecast on Monday, as strong demand for its higher-tier plans powered better-than-expected earnings in the second quarter.】

item.title: 早间竞价日本首相坚守岗位，日元反弹
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 在波音公司做出保证后，瑞安航空决定不改变 MAX 10 订单
item.description: 瑞安航空公司首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）周一表示，在得到波音公司关于MAX 10飞机将按时交付的保证后，瑞安决定不将定于2027年初交付的MAX 10飞机换成较小的MAX 8飞机。【原文：Ryanair has decided not to switch MAX 10 aircraft due for delivery in early 2027 to the smaller MAX 8 aircraft following reassurances from Boeing that they will arrive on time, Chief Executive Michael O'Leary said on Monday.】

item.title: 商业游说团体称美国关税可能使意大利损失高达 0.8% 的 GDP
item.description: 在跨大西洋贸易谈判继续进行之际，意大利主要的商业游说团体周一表示，美国对欧盟商品征收30%的关税可能会使意大利2027年的国内生产总值减少0.8%。【原文：U.S. tariffs of 30% on European Union goods could shave up to 0.8% off Italy's gross domestic product in 2027, the country's main business lobby said on Monday, as transatlantic trade negotiations continued.】
